item.description:
At last! Following 7 successful Intellectual Snob meetups from last summer with Nerd Fun, surely there must be plenty of room by now for a final Intellectual Snob endeavor.

Appropriately we meet at Grendels Den, Harvard Sq. They have a glorious half-price menu indoors between the hours of 5 and 7:30. (with the purchase of a $3 drink).

The premise is that Intellectuals all have deeply held convictions they want to share about baffling literary or scientific subjects --or, dare I say it--unanswered questions, they wish to convey incognito.

This time, instead of writing the question or statement on to our name tag labels, let everyone submit their questions or statements into a bowl at the table center. Once this deed is done, anyone may pick from this container at table center what was submitted in to the bowl.

Having judged its appropriateness and/or interest to the group, the question or statement will be read aloud to the group or any one in earshot nearby for discussion.

HUMOR in good taste IS ALLOWED. PSEUDO intellectuals are also welcome.
Fake mustaches, Corduroy jackets with elbow patches, fold-up sunglasses, even monocles are allowed. Intriguing and obscure texts are allowed as props. No Meerschaum tobacco pipes, please.
Take heed, Grendels fills up fast after 5:30 so get there on time, for prompt service and space, & because it gets louder & more confusing as the place fills up.

Please bring cash, Grendels snob-stressed waitstaff disdain seperate (individual) tabs.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a blue-striped cap.
item.name: Intellectual Snob Mixer
